title: Ep 533 | Jase Gets Hustled by an Airline Employee & Science Is Officially Losing All Credibility
description:
Phil details all the ways God has equipped us to stand firm against trial or tribulation. Jase can't help but share his recent experience at the airport and how the little rules sometimes make no sense at all — and cause harm. Al discusses how science is losing its credibility in the culture. And Jase talks about religion and the freedom of speech we inherited from the great assembly of men we call the founding fathers. 

https://talkshop.live/watch/kNa2Qoub38oD — The ONLY place to get your signed copy of "Your Daily Phil" by Phil Robertson

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://CovEyes.com/PHIL and get a 30 Day free trial
